mapper.select:
SELECT hb.project_type type, hbi.company_or_personal AS comOrPer, hb.borrow_nid AS borrowNid, hb.borrow_apr AS borrowApr, hb.borrow_style AS borrowStyle, hbc.credit_nid AS creditNid, hbc.tender_nid AS tenderNid, hbc.credit_capital AS creditCapital, ( hbc.credit_capital - hbc.credit_capital_assigned ) AS creditAssignCapital, hbc.credit_discount AS creditDiscount, hbc.credit_term AS creditTerm, hbc.credit_term_hold AS creditTermHold, CASE WHEN hb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrowPeriod, hbc.credit_price AS creditPrice, FROM_UNIXTIME( hbc.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS creditTime, hbc.create_time AS creditTimeInt, hu.truename AS creditUserTrueName, hbc.credit_user_id AS creditUserId, hbc.credit_repay_end_time AS creditRepayEndTime, CASE WHEN hb.`status` = 0 AND hb.verify_status = 1 THEN '10' WHEN hb.`status` = 1 AND hb.borrow_status = 1 AND hb.borrow_account_yes < hb.account AND ( hb.verify_time + ( hb.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 * 60 ) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) THEN '11' WHEN hb.`status` = 1 AND hb.reverify_time = '0' AND ( ( hb.reverify_status = 0 AND hb.borrow_account_yes >= hb.account ) OR ( hb.verify_time + ( hb.borrow_valid_time * 24 * 60 * 60 ) < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) ) THEN '12' WHEN hb.`status` = 3 AND hb.repay_full_status = 0 THEN '13' WHEN hb.`status` = 3 AND hb.repay_full_status = 1 THEN '14'
ELSE '' END AS `status` FROM ht_borrow_credit hbc LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbc.bid_nid = hb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_info hbi on hbi.borrow_nid = hbc.bid_nid LEFT JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hu.user_id = hbc.credit_user_id WHERE hbc.credit_nid = #{creditNid}

SELECT
hbc.credit_nid AS creditNid,
CONCAT('HZR',hbc.credit_nid ) AS creditNidPage,
CONCAT(hbc.credit_term ,'天') AS borrowPeriod,
hbc.credit_term AS creditTerm,
hbc.credit_term_hold creditTermHold,
hbc.credit_status AS status,
hbc.credit_capital AS creditCapital,
(hbc.credit_capital - hbc.credit_capital_assigned) AS investAccount,
hbc.credit_discount AS creditDiscount,
hydbs.name AS repayStyle,
hbc.bid_nid AS bidNid,
hbc.bid_apr AS bidApr,
FROM_UNIXTIME(hbc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS creditTime,
FROM_UNIXTIME(hbc.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS endTime,
FROM_UNIXTIME(hbc.assign_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS assignTime,
truncate(hbc.credit_capital_assigned/hbc.credit_capital*100,2) AS borrowSchedule FROM ht_borrow_credit hbc LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbc.bid_nid = hb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style hydbs ON hydbs.nid = hb.borrow_style WHERE hbc.credit_nid = #{creditNid}
SELECT count(bc.credit_id) FROM ht_borrow_credit bc INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bc.bid_nid = b.borrow_nid

SELECT SUM(bc.credit_capital) AS credit_capital, SUM(bc.credit_capital) AS credit_capital_price, SUM(bc.credit_price) AS credit_price, SUM(bc.credit_capital_assigned) AS credit_capital_assigned FROM ht_borrow_credit bc INNER JOIN ht_borrow b ON bc.bid_nid = b.borrow_nid

where.if: AND ( bc.credit_status = 1 OR ( bc.credit_status = 0 AND bc.create_time < UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) ) )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid WHERE ct.credit_nid = #{creditNid}

SELECT ct.assign_nid , ct.client , ct.credit_nid , ct.bid_nid , ct.user_name , ct.credit_user_name, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assign_capital, FORMAT(bc.credit_discount, 2) AS credit_discount, FORMAT(ct.assign_capital, 2) AS assign_capital_price, FORMAT(ct.assign_price, 2) AS assign_price, FORMAT(ct.assign_interest_advance, 2) AS assign_interest_advance, FORMAT(ct.credit_fee, 2) AS credit_fee, FORMAT(ct.assign_pay, 2) AS assign_pay, ct.create_time AS add_time FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid WHERE ct.credit_nid = #{creditNid} ORDER BY bc.create_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS assign_capital, SUM(ct.assign_capital) AS assign_capital_price, SUM(ct.assign_price) AS assign_price, SUM(ct.assign_interest_advance) AS assign_interest_advance, SUM(ct.credit_fee) AS credit_fee, SUM(ct.assign_pay) AS assign_pay FROM ht_credit_tender ct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_credit bc ON bc.bid_nid = ct.bid_nid AND bc.credit_nid = ct.credit_nid WHERE ct.credit_nid = #{creditNid}

SELECT SUM(hhdct.assign_capital) AS sumAccount FROM ht_hjh_debt_credit_tender hhdct
WHERE hhdct.borrow_nid = #{borrowNid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
